name: Orbis Media Technologies
tag_list: enterprise-mobility-solution, mobile-application, real-time-data-capture, android-application, field-staff, workflow-management, increase-roi
overview:
Orbis Media Technologies serves the mobile space by offering business solutions to its client base, that includes verticals like field service, telecom, transportation and distribution, government, construction, pharmaceutical, financial and insurance, logistics, sales force automation, and many more.

The company provides a simple yet powerful tool that helps customers in tracking their employees’ tasks, schedules, and location while on the move. The design and built-in architecture allows to customize the application to suit specific requirements. Instant reporting helps administrators in better planning of resources, man, machine and money.

offices.address1: Second Floor, B.B.Court, No.526 7th Cross, 10th Main, Jeevan Bhimanagar, Bangalore-560 075, India
